name: Fruit Panic
overview: This is actually a remake of a classic MSX game with the same name. It is a nice twist on the Pac-Man formula. Get all the fruit before the ghosts get you and instead of running through a maze, you'll have to reach fruit on different platforms. You reach higher platforms using a springboard (is that an English word?!) and when a ghosts is tailing you, you can kill it with a limited number of bombs.
